title: Quarkus Redis Cluster mode gives java.lang.NullPointerException when run multiple keyCommands

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

Configuration : 
quarkus.redis.hosts=rediss://${xyz}:6379
quarkus.redis.client-type=cluster
quarkus.redis.replicas=share
quarkus.redis.password=${passwd}
quarkus.redis.max-pool-size=100
quarkus.redis.max-pool-waiting=200
quarkus.redis.reconnect-attempts=3
quarkus.redis.reconnect-interval=3S
quarkus.redis.pool-cleaner-interval=30S

ErrorLine : 
`for (String item : items) {
				deleteTimer.record(() -> keyCommands.del(item));
			}`
Error PFA :
[redis-vertx-NPE.txt](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/12044614/redis-vertx-NPE.txt)



### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

11
### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.4
### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)
